titles.title: To designate a United States Post Office in Brewer, Maine, as the "General Joshua Lawrence Chamberlain Post Office".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.

bill.summary: 9/26/1996--Introduced. Designates the U.S. Post Office located at 22 Parkway South in Brewer, Maine, as the General Joshua Lawrence Chamberlain Post Office.
